title: How to write Kannada in Photoshop - Quora

response.answer_text: You can write in Kannada in any software package. Install Baraha and with the package you get Baraha IME. Click on Baraha IME icon on your desktop. IME will be activated and it will sit quietly at the bottom right corner. Whenever you need to type in Kannada, or any other major Indian regional language, click on this IME icon, Right click on Language, choose your language and that’s it. You can type in that language using phonetic transliteration. The F11 key toggles between English and regional language you have chosen. See this sample: हिन्दी ಕನ್ನಡ தமிழ் ગુજરાતી മലയാലമ് Other languages available are Bengali, Telugu, Oriya Punjabi , Oriya, Assamese, Sanskrit and Marathi You can download a trial version from Baraha - Indian Language Software (Official Site) - Typing Software, Free Trial, Free Download, Text Editor Software and Fonts, Kannada Software, Konkani Software, Tulu Software, Hindi Software, Marathi Software, Sanskrit Software, Tamil Software, Telugu Software, Malayalam Software, Gujarati Software, Punjabi Software, Bengali Software, Assamese Software, Oriya Software I have been using an old version of it (sufficient for my limited needs) for the past few years and am pretty pleased with it. I use only it’s text editor and the IME GV

To type kannada in your Photoshop you required a Baraha software, First Open Baraha Software, Write the kannada text as per the Baraha Software,  Then Click on Convert icon  after converting, Right Click & Select Copy Special  And Select Test (ANSI) and click OK  Go to Photoshop and Select Text Tool, Right Click Paste the copied text in Photoshop or Illustrator  Sometimes text will be set to default font then Change the font to BRH Kannada.  Thank You.
